content: Keep heading up, and look left before reaching the top of the stairs. This time, you’ll find a **Meditation Spot** around the corner at the foot of a large tiger statue, and resting at it will award you a free Spark Skill Point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Keep heading up, and look left before reaching the top of the stairs. This time, you’ll find a **Meditation Spot** around the corner at the foot of a large tiger statue, and resting at it will award you a free Spark Skill Point.
